scripts.dev-electron-web: cross-env NODE_ENV=development yarn copy:inject && yarn build:main && cd ../expo-example && yarn dev:electron-web
scripts.build-electron-web: yarn copy:inject && yarn build:main && cd ../expo-example && yarn build:electron-web
scripts.dev: npx concurrently "yarn dev:electron" "cross-env TRANSFORM_REGENERATOR_DISABLED=true BROWSER=none yarn dev-electron-web"
scripts.make: yarn clean:build && yarn build-electron-web && electron-builder build -mw --config electron-builder.config.js --publish never
